sqlMap.select: SELECT ZC_BI_NO, ZC_USE_BI_ID, SUM(ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM) AS ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM, SUM(ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM) AS ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, SUM(ZHIFUSUM) AS ZHIFUSUM FROM (SELECT M.ZC_BI_NO, M.ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM, H.ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, M.ZC_USE_BI_ID, NVL(BALI.ZC_BI_BCJS_SUM, 0) AS ZHIFUSUM FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI M, ZC_XMCG_HT_BI H, ZC_XMCG_HT HT, (SELECT PBI.* FROM ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI PBI, ZC_P_PRO_BAL BAL WHERE PBI.ZC_BAL_ID = BAL.ZC_BAL_ID AND BAL.ZC_BAL_STATUS = 'exec') BALI WHERE M.ZC_BI_NO = H.ZC_BI_NO AND H.ZC_HT_CODE = HT.ZC_HT_CODE AND HT.ZC_MAKE_CODE = M.ZC_MAKE_CODE AND HT.ND = #nd# and ht.zc_parht_code is null AND HT.ZC_MAKE_CODE IN ($zcText0$) AND M.ZC_MAKE_CODE = BALI.ZC_CODE(+) AND M.ZC_USE_BI_ID = BALI.ZC_HT_BI_NO(+) union select htbi.zc_bi_no, htbi.zc_bi_bcsy_sum AS ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM, htbi.zc_bi_bcsy_sum AS ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, htbi.zc_use_bi_id, NVL(bbi.ZC_BI_BCJS_SUM, 0) AS ZHIFUSUM from zc_xmcg_ht ht, zc_xmcg_ht_bi htbi, zc_p_pro_bal b, zc_p_pro_bal_bi bbi where ht.zc_ht_code = b.zc_ht_code(+) and b.zc_bal_id = bbi.zc_bal_id and b.ZC_BAL_STATUS = 'exec' and ht.nd = #nd# and ht.zc_parht_code is not null and HT.ZC_MAKE_CODE IN ($zcText0$) and ht.zc_ht_code = htbi.zc_ht_code and htbi.zc_use_bi_id = bbi.zc_ht_bi_no(+)) A GROUP BY A.ZC_BI_NO, ZC_USE_BI_ID union select mbi.zc_bi_no,mbi.zc_use_bi_id,mbi.zc_bi_jhua_sum,0 as ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM,0 as ZHIFUSUM from zc_p_pro_mitem_bi mbi, zc_p_pro_make m where m.zc_make_code = mbi.zc_make_code and not exists (select * from zc_xmcg_ht h where h.zc_make_code = m.zc_make_code) and m.nd = #nd# and m.zc_make_code in ($zcText0$)

select mk.zc_make_code, mk.zc_make_name, mk.zc_make_status, mk.zc_pifu_cgfs, mk.zc_yep_flag, mk.zc_temp_make_code, mk.zc_money_bi_sum, mk.co_code, nvl(h.zc_ht_num,0) zc_ht_num, nvl(b.zc_bal_sum,0) zc_bal_sum, e.co_name from zc_p_pro_make mk, (select ht.zc_make_code, sum(ht.zc_ht_num) zc_ht_num from zc_xmcg_ht ht where ht.zc_ht_status = 'exec' and ht.nd=#nd# group by ht.zc_make_code) h, (select bal.zc_make_code, sum(bal.zc_bal_sum) zc_bal_sum from zc_p_pro_bal bal where bal.zc_bal_status = 'exec' and bal.nd=#nd# group by bal.zc_make_code) b, ma_company e where mk.zc_make_code = h.zc_make_code(+) and mk.zc_make_code = b.zc_make_code(+) and mk.co_code=e.co_code and mk.nd=e.nd
mk.co_code = #coCode#
and mk.nd=#nd# and mk.zc_yep_flag=#status#

select jh.zc_make_code, jh.zc_bi_no, nvl(sum(jh.zc_bi_jhua_sum), 0) zc_bi_jhua_sum, jh.zc_use_bi_id, nvl(sum(bb.zc_bi_bcjs_sum), 0) zc_bi_bcjs_sum from (select mb.zc_make_code, mb.zc_bi_no, mb.zc_bi_jhua_sum, mb.zc_use_bi_id from zc_p_pro_mitem_bi mb union (select hb.zc_make_code, hb.zc_bi_no, hb.zc_bi_bcsy_sum, hb.zc_use_bi_id from zc_xmcg_ht_bi hb, zc_xmcg_ht ht where hb.zc_ht_code = ht.zc_ht_code and ht.zc_parht_code is not null and ht.zc_ht_status = 'exec')) jh, zc_p_pro_bal_bi bb where jh.zc_make_code in ($value$) and jh.zc_bi_no is not null and jh.zc_make_code = bb.zc_code(+) and jh.zc_bi_no = bb.zc_bi_no(+) group by jh.zc_make_code, jh.zc_bi_no, jh.zc_use_bi_id order by zc_make_code,zc_bi_no, zc_bi_bcjs_sum
